about-us.description:
Marias Paperdolls are made of recycled newspapers and magazines in order to materialize and power up creativity.

MARIAS PAPERDOLLS, are born in 2011 from the passion and dream to give life to a raw material that turns out into a unique doll, with soul and its own language.
about-us.process-description:
Each MARIA in unique and exclusive. Each MARIA tells a story and a state of mind.
The family is already big, combining the simplicity of using materials such as paper, glue, water, balloons with the illustration technique - Acrylic painting

The creation is a time-consuming and painstaking process, preceded by a research work that is the inspiration to the history and meaning of each MARIA.
about-us.quote:
O meu mundo não é como o dos outros, quero mais, exijo de mais, há em mim uma sede de infinito, uma angústia constante que nem eu mesmo compreendo, pois estou longe de ser uma pessimista; sou antes uma exaltada, com uma alma intensa e violenta, atormentada, uma alma que se não sente bem onde está, que tem saudades... sei lá de quê!

Correspondência 1930 Florbela Espanca
about-us.title: Claudia Nair

contact.title: Want know more?
home.description:
MARIAS PAPERDOLLS project is born from the passion, creativity, dream, and ambition of a Porto artist.

Marias are paper dolls with soul and identity.

These gorgeous paper sculptures are inspired in a contemporary concept with an environmental approach, designed by Cláudia Nair.
home.slogan: There are dolls and there are marias
